snippet: State Senator Kent Sorenson resigned Wednesday after an investigator concluded that he most likely broke ethics rules by receiving income from a political action committee.
abstract: Iowa State Senator Kent Sorenson resigns after an investigator concludes that he most likely broke ethics rules by receiving income from political action committee linked to Michele Bachmann and from Ron Paul's presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Kent Sorenson resigned Wednesday after an investigator concluded that he most likely broke ethics rules by receiving income from a political action committee.

headline.main: Iowa: State Senator in Inquiry Resigns
headline.print_headline: Iowa: State Senator In Inquiry Resigns
